title: 724events
text:
724events is an event management website project

 • Executed manual tests
 • Executed exploratory tests
 • Reported anomalies using Jira
 • Updated Test Specification Document

title: Eco Bliss Bath
text:
Eco Bliss Bath is an e-commerce project for beauty products

 • Automated functional and API end-to-end (E2E) tests using Cypress
 • Executed a validation campaign
 • Wrote and presented the validation campaign report

title: Tomsen
text:
Tomsen is a financial management app project for individuals

 • Reviewed requirements
 • Designed the test strategy
 • Designed the Test Specification Document

title: Menu Maker by Qwenta
text:
Menu Maker by Qwenta is a menu customization app project

 • Built a web technology watch system
 • Defined the project's technical needs
 • Wrote user stories using Agile methodology
 • Created a Kanban board and organized tasks in sprints

title: My portfolio
text:
My online portfolio

 • Identified and fixed anomalies on an existing website
 • Customized the website
 • Optimized the SEO and performance of the website
